summary: HeLP I made a Irondad & spiderson/daughter playlist on Spotify and I don’t wanna add any romantic songs so I need help for good...
question: HeLP I made a Irondad & spiderson/daughter playlist on Spotify and I don’t wanna add any romantic songs so I need help for good platonic ones plEASE that you relate to them. I’ll give u the link if u want
answer: Okay, I’m not going to lie. I am the absolute worst at this!! I don’t listen to music when I write so I have no idea what songs would work for this! I’m so sorry! Does anyone else have any ideas?

body:
Field trip to Avengers/Stark Tower

One of my favorite tropes in fanfiction is when Peter Parker is forced to go on a field trip to Stark Tower and is then embarrassed by his Superfamily.

  • You chose my house for a field trip?! by  MythicalCypressWater via AO3

Summary:  When Peter’s Chemistry Teacher announces that the class would be going to Stark Industries for a field trip, he thought he was screwed.

When the Avengers start embarrassing him, he knows he is.

Tags/Warnings: Superfamily, protective avengers, embarrassed peter, 10,373 words.

  • Wait, You Actually Work Here? by Shirosbluesamurai via AO3

Summary: Peter goes on a field trip to the Avengers Tower with his class. Everyone loves him except for Flash, who is getting suspicious of Peter.

Tags/Warnings: Intern Peter Parker, Peter and Shuri are friends, 3,386 words.

  • Perhaps He’s Not Missing Out After All. by NotYoCheese via AO3

Summary:  Peter is devastated after he is told that he is not allowed to go on the field trip with the rest of his class tomorrow. Tony steps in and tells him that he can stay at the tower on the day of the field trip. Only, Peter didn’t realize that the field trip was to the tower, and guess who the lucky intern who gets to give them a tour is …

Tags/Warnings: Parent Tony Stark (which at this rate can be considered canon tbh), Intern Peter Parker, 6,638 words.

  • Peter Parker’s Fantastic Field Trip by AfricabyToto via Fanfiction.net

Summary:  Peter Parker didn’t think his day could get any worse- until he was proven wrong. When his teacher announces that his class is taking a field trip to Stark Industries, Peter knows that there’s no getting out of this. Tony’s gonna embarrass him, Cap’s gonna give his ‘don’t do drugs’ lecture, and there’s no telling what the rest of the Avengers will do.

Tags/Warnings: T rated, 7886 words.

  • Peter Parker and the Unforgettable Field Trip by R.Halliwell-Parker via Fanfiction.net

Summary: Peter Parker’s feeling of excitement upon hearing of the field trip is soon replaced by a feeling of dread when he discovers that the trip is to Stark Industries.

Tags/Warnings: Pre-Infinity War, Post-Homecoming, 3350 words.

  • Field Trips Never Go Well For Peter Parker by Mimirou via AO3

Summary: Peter’s class goes on a field trip to Stark Industries. With his week starting bad, he can only hope it doesn’t get too much worse.

Tags/Warnings: Sensory overload, Irondad and Spiderson, 5175 words.

  • To the Tower by prolixology via AO3

Summary: If everything would actually go according to plan, then Peter might actually make it through this field trip unscathed. If. Of course, there was always the chance Flash would say something particularity stupid, which Peter considered to be almost impressive, considering his usual-unusually low standards, but Peter prayed that wouldn’t happen. Besides, it was his senior field trip, absolute last one, and he had made it though most of them (excluding his past two trips, but who’s counting?) unscathed, so why would a trip to Stark Tower be any different?

Tags/Warnings: Flash Thompson is a bully, Irondad, Spiderson, 5029 words.

  • Bullies, Interns, and Secret Things by CuriousClockwork via AO3

Summary:  Two and half years have passed since Peter Parker donned the Spider-man suit and made a name for himself. A lot has happened to him and the other Avengers in that time and as the middle of Peter’s senior school year arrives, Midtown High School gets a surprise invitation for their engineering students to take a tour of Stark Industries.

Tags/Warnings: Brief reference to blood, fluff, superfamily, 51594 words.

  • The Awful Field Trip by Morana_black via AO3

Summary: Peter’s permission slip is signed by Tony Stark, Peter’s teacher doesn’t believe him. The class sees Peter there anyway.(Or Peter’s class goes on a trip to SI, and Peter isn’t allowed. But since he’s staying at the tower anyway, he doesn’t exactly miss out.)

Tags/Warnings: Deaf Clint Barton, Shuri and Peter and memes, bisexual Peter, Gay Shuri.

blog.name: mxltifandoms-imagines
blog.title: Mxltifandoms Imagines
blog.description: Writing about characters you won't see a lot of on tumblr. You can see the fandoms I write about in fandoms list . If you don't see your favorite character there, you can ask me. Feel free to talk to me, too. I do imagines, moodboards, would involves, text messages and AU Memes.

summary: IMAGINE BEING CLINT’S TEENAGER DAUGHTER AND TEACHING PETER ARCHERY. “Archery isn’t really your thing, huh?” you teased Peter,...
caption:
IMAGINE BEING CLINT’S TEENAGER DAUGHTER AND TEACHING PETER ARCHERY.

“Archery isn’t really your thing, huh?” you teased Peter, your eyes observing carefully the position he had adopted for the lessons. “Separate your feets.”

The shy boy denied at the same time he obeyed your instruction. “You know, I just do what spiders do.”

“Don’t worry.” - you said in an attempt to calm him, although you found the situation quite cute. “You’ll be able to handle it…”

Then, he shot but obviously he failed.

“…in some lessons. Perfection requires time, Peter; however, you have an incredible archer to teach you. ”

blog.name: ao3feed-peterparker
blog.title: AO3Feed: Peter Parker
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

title: New allies
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2U4yIN2

by Polotime

Bucky ran towards them at high speed not aware of what he was thinking, he shoves one of them and heads for the road, he runs down the road when a huge truck heads toward his way, Bucky turn at the sound and every voice around him disappears, he stops for no reason, he tried to move but his head is not responding but only listening to the sound of the horn, then everything turns black

—————————-
Bucky learned to make new friends and family and meets old “enemies”

Words: 1267, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Marvel, Marvel Ultimates
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences

by Polotime

Bucky ran towards them at high speed not aware of what he was thinking, he shoves one of them and heads for the road, he runs down the road when a huge truck heads toward his way, Bucky turn at the sound and every voice around him disappears, he stops for no reason, he tried to move but his head is not responding but only listening to the sound of the horn, then everything turns black

—————————-
Bucky learned to make new friends and family and meets old “enemies”

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive of Our Own under the tag Peter Parker. The stories are automatically posted here from the RSS feed.

title: far from the sidewalk
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ulfowD

by LermEn

Питер смотрел на него с восхищением. Так было с самого первого дня, когда он впечатлительным ребенком жадно вглядывался в новостную строку, уже тогда зная, кто будет его героем. Каждый второй видел в имени Тони именно то, о чем нашептывала их корысть, но для Питера когда-то была только одна истина: «ты - Тони Старк, и я верю тебе».
\ На фоне очередного пережитого армагеддона Тони все же слетает с катушек и в этот момент под рукой оказывается Питер.

  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Peter Parker
  • Additional Tags: Angst, Drama, Psychology, Dark, Hurt/Comfort, Violence, Mental Instability, Dubious Consent, AU, Non-Linear Narrative, Abuse, Songfic

summary: For All the World to See
title: For All the World to See
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Cx9DQY

by AmethystClearwater

The war is finally over. Thanos is gone. most of those lost are back, but not everyone made it back. Those who have been recovered are having a hard time coping with what they went through… and what they brought back.

(Or: Peter and Stephen are back, but they’re not the same as before. Brag some tissues and ice cream, cause this is one hell of an emotional roller coaster.)

Words: 660, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man - All Media Types, Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence, Major Character Death
  • Categories: Multi
  • Characters: Peter Parker, Bruce Banner, Stephen Strange, Loki, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Tony Stark, Thor, Clint Barton

blog.name: why-i-love-comics
blog.title: A blog dedicated to all your favorite moments
blog.description: Batman, Say it fast. Really fast. As fast as you can. Over and over. So what do you hear? Badman. Bad. Man. Batman. Badman. To me... Now and forever... one and                                             the same. - Peter J. Tomasi                                                                         all spoiler posts are tagged "wednesday spoilers"                                             add me on snapchapt! taskrnaster (with an RN instead of M)

blog.name: tonys-stank
blog.title: marvel(ous) bitch
blog.description: whaddup I’m gracie I’m 19 and I never fucking learned how to obsess over things in a healthy way | lots of ironstrange but I dabble in other shit

summary:
Peter: *walking with a blanket over him*
Tony: uh kid? what are you doing?
Peter: I’ve decided to live as a bed from now on...
body:
Peter: *walking with a blanket over him*

Tony: uh kid? what are you doing?

Peter: I’ve decided to live as a bed from now on because I know this blanket will never hurt me

Peter: *walks into table and falls*

Peter: OW! I HATE YOU BLANKET!

reblog.comment:
